contactSeoTitle: Contact | JustDiveCol - Plan Your Next Underwater Adventure
contactSeoDesc: Ready to explore the deep blue? Contact us to design your dream trip, answer your questions, or simply share our passion for the incredible underwater world with JustDiveCol.
contactSeoKeywords: contact, JustDiveCol, underwater adventure, plan a dive trip, diving questions, passion for the ocean, WhatsApp diving, JustDiveCol communication, dive customer service
contactHeaderTitle: Let's Talk About Your Next Great Adventure
contactHeaderSubtitle: We're here to answer your questions, help you plan that dream trip, or simply share our passion for the ocean. Your adventure begins with a conversation!
contactEmailBody: Hello, I would like more information about JustDiveCol's services.
contactWhatsAppTitle: Send Us a Message on WhatsApp
contactWhatsAppDesc: Have a quick question, need personalized advice, or prefer a more direct conversation? Click the button to chat with our team. We're ready to help you plan your perfect dive!
courseInquiryMessage: Hello, JustDiveCol team. I would like to receive more information about the {{courseName}} course.
contactFollowUs: Follow Us on Our Social Media
contactCtaTitle: Ready for the Big Plunge? We're Waiting for You!
contactCtaSubtitle: The wonders of the deep await you. Tell us your underwater dream, and we'll make it a reality. Your next unforgettable adventure begins with a simple conversation!
generalWhatsappMessage: Hello, JustDiveCol. I would like to get some general information about your services. Could you assist me?
experienceWhatsappMessage: Hello, JustDiveCol. I'm interested in your experience: {{experienceName}}. Could you give me more details or help me book my spot?
destinationWhatsappMessage: Hello, JustDiveCol. I would like more information about the dive trips to {{destinationName}}. I'm ready to explore this destination!
certificationWhatsappMessage: Hello, JustDiveCol. I'm interested in the {{courseName}} certification course. Could you inform me about upcoming dates or requirements?
customWhatsappMessage: Hello, JustDiveCol. I would like to design a tailor-made diving experience! I have an idea in mind and want to explore personalized options with you. Could you help me?
